effect_entries.effect: Give to the []{pokemon:wingull} on []{location:unova-route-13}, along with []{item:gram-1} and []{item:gram-3}, to receive []{item:tm89}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Part of a sidequest to obtain []{item:tm89}.

flavor_text_entries.text:
キャモメが　配達している
たいせつな　手紙。

An important letter that
Wingull delivers.

Un’importante lettera che Wingull deve
consegnare.

Ruedas que se acoplan a la suela del calzado
y te permiten ir más rápido y realizar piruetas
espectaculares.
Eine wichtige Briefpost, überbracht von Wingull.
Un courrier important transporté par un Goélise.

キャモメが　はいたつ　している
たいせつな　てがみ。

An important letter which
Wingull delivers.

An important letter which
Wingull delivers.

Un courrier important
transporté par un Goélise.
